name: run_yolov8_images
description: This Action executes the YOLOv8 object detection algorithm on a folder with images. For each processed folder with images, it generates a detections.json file with bounding box or segmentation annotations. Additionally, it can provide annotated output videos.

parameters.name: SAVE_VIDEO
parameters.description: Set True to save videos with detections or segmentations

parameters.name: MODEL_NAME
parameters.description: Model name to use for inference: allowed values are yolov8n, yolov8s, yolov8m, yolov8l, yolov8x, yolov8n-seg, yolov8s-seg, yolov8m-seg, yolov8l-seg, yolov8x-seg
